feed.title: WeKan Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for WeKan: v7.84
entry.content:
This release adds the following new features:

  • Time on minicard for Start/End/Due Date. Thanks to Rayene123.

and adds the following updates:

  • Added developer docs about Login code. Thanks to xet7.
  • Updated dependencies. Part 1, Part 2. Thanks to developers of dependencies.

and fixes the following bugs:

  • Fixed typo at Shortcuts, now became visible translations of assignees visibility 1-9 shortcuts. Thanks to xet7.
  • Fixed building OpenAPI docs. Thanks to xet7.

Thanks to above GitHub users for their contributions and translators for their translations.

entry.title: New release for WeKan: v7.85
entry.content:
This release adds the following updates:

  • Updated Browser compatibility matrix, adding Iris browser at RISC OS Direct, and fixing links. Part1, Part2. Thanks to xet7.
  • Updated to MongoDB 6.0.22. Thanks to MongoDB developers.

and fixes the following bugs:

  • Fix board sidebar menu doesn't open in mobile. Thanks to mimZD and xet7.

Thanks to above GitHub users for their contributions and translators for their translations.

entry.title: New release for WeKan: v7.86
entry.content:
This release adds the following updates:

  • Improve impersonate user documentation in docs/Admin/Impersonate-user.md. Thanks to nourguidara.

and fixes the following bugs:

  • Add toggle watch icon on card. Add questions are you sure to duplicate board and archive board. Thanks to Rayene123.
  • Fix translations not working. Thanks to nourguidara.
  • Fix contrast issue checkbox at Exodark theme. Thanks to walster001.

Thanks to above GitHub users for their contributions and translators for their translations.

entry.title: New release for WeKan: v7.87
entry.content:
This release fixes the following bugs:

  • Fix typos. Thanks to xet7.
  • Fix more contrasting issues. Thanks to walster001.

Thanks to above GitHub users for their contributions and translators for their translations.

entry.title: New release for WeKan: v7.88
entry.content:
This release fixes the following bugs:

  • Reverted translation fix that sometimes did not work. Thanks to xet7.

Thanks to above GitHub users for their contributions and translators for their translations.
